SELECT u.user_id, u.username, u.user_type, u.mobile, u.`status`, d.`name`, role.role_name, ( SELECT count(1) FROM food_machine_add_stock_order f WHERE f.performer = u.user_id AND f.type = 0 AND f.`status`=1 ) AS orderCount FROM `sys_user` u LEFT JOIN sys_dept d ON u.dept_id = d.dept_id LEFT JOIN sys_user_role r ON u.user_id = r.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_role role ON r.role_id = role.role_id WHERE u.user_type = 4
and u.username LIKE '%${userName}%'
and u.mobile LIKE '%${mobile}%'
and date_format(u.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') = #{createTime}
